Text:
Going to try it Bit, but usually this low of MBs means bad quaility^^. I can handle bad quaility with these old VHS classics...but tghier is a limet LO(L.

    Cant wait to see you sporting s Skull someday buds!

Know what you mean, but some of these simply can't be found anymore so I get and put forth what I have and try to warn as best I can about quality..=)  I have DvD rips of all of the big sci-fi hits of this era, but most are posted on the Bay already.  I also have some rare ones that are barely watchable.  The search continues to this day for better rips.

Thanks for the kudo's Silk!!
